title: inda ahambhAvam vENDAm
sahitya:
inda ahambhAvam vENDAm manamE Edukkena summA vAdukk-izhukkuginrAi


anupallavi

  tantira valaiyilE taLukkAghap-piDittennai sandi sirikka vaikkum sakalAcala mAyamE


caraNam    sENiyan tariyilE cETTaik-kurangupOlE dEhattilE pughundu timisham paNNum pEyE
AnavamE unnai ANDavan pAdattil azhundak-kaTTi ozhittEn vizhundu kumbiDuvAyE
